Community I got it No more reminders Ultimate Edition price description %s function is the IM Ultimate Edition function, which can be used after purchasing the Ultimate Edition package. Please refer to the price description for details.
Friend request is empty Group chats is empty Block list is emply
Choose Avatar Group Avatar Group Name Edit Group ID Group ID (optional) Group Type Create Select group type Friends Working group(Work) Friends work group (Work): Similar to ordinary WeChat groups, after creation, only friends who are already in the group can be invited to join the group, and there is no need for the approval of the invitee or the approval of the group owner. Stranger Social group(Public） Stranger social group (Public): Similar to QQ group, the group owner can designate the group administrator after creation. After the user searches for the group ID and initiates a group application, the group owner or administrator must approve it before joining the group. Temporary Meeting group(Meeting） Temporary meeting group (Meeting): After creation, you can enter and leave at will, and support viewing of messages before joining the group; it is suitable for audio and video conference scenarios, online education scenarios, and other scenarios that are combined with real-time audio and video products. Community(Community) Community(Community)：After creation, you can enter and leave at will, support up to 100,000 people, support historical message storage, and after users search for group ID and initiate a group application, they can join the group without administrator approval. Group name cannot be empty! Group name up to 30 bytes! Group ID prefix cannot be @TGS# ! Group ID up to 48 bytes! See details product documentation product documentation View product documentation
